mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into api_beadhouseperson( id,audit_state, name,gender, idcard_no,phone, self_care,household, buildup_area,is_poor, town,village_name, created_on,deleted, etl_time )values ( #{id},#{auditState}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{name}, 'e' )), #{gender}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{idcardNo}, 'e' )), HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{phone}, 'e' )), #{selfCare},#{household}, #{buildupArea},#{isPoor}, #{town},#{villageName}, #{createdOn},#{deleted}, #{etlTime} )

insert IGNORE into api_communitypopul( id , community_name , neighbourhood_name , building_no , unit_no , storey_no , household_no , name , relation , gender , birthday , idcard_no , marriage , nation , registration_status , phone , address , work_place , political_orientation , retiree , note , room_no , town , audit_state , created_on , deleted , etl_time )values ( #{id}, #{CommunityName}, #{NeighbourhoodName}, #{BuildingNo}, #{UnitNo}, #{StoreyNo}, #{HouseholdNo}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Name},'e')), #{Relation}, #{Gender}, #{Birthday}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{IdCardNo},'e')), #{Marriage}, #{Nation}, #{RegistrationStatus}, HEX(AES_ENCRYPT(#{Phone},'e')), #{Address}, #{WorkPlace}, #{PoliticalOrientation}, #{Retiree}, #{Note}, #{RoomNo}, #{Town}, #{AuditState}, #{createdOn}, #{deleted}, #{etlTime} )
